p: The dry biomass concentration was measured by transferring a culture to a pre-weighed centrifuge tube and centrifuging at 4,000 rpm for 10 min to get a thick microalgal paste every 24 h. The paste, rinsed with distilled water to remove residual salts, was dried in a hot air oven at 60 °C for 8 h. The lipid was extracted from dry biomass using Bligh and Dyer’s (1959) method with slight modification. The amount of oil extracted (% w/w) was calculated according to Suganya and Renganathan (2012).
